SELECT id, smsname, sendtype, host, username, pwd, accountattr, passwdattr, phoneattr, messageattr, paramannex, sendresult, enabled, priority, retrysend, descp FROM
(select top $pageSize$ * from otppms_smsinfo where id not in
(select top $startRow$ id from otppms_smsinfo order by id DESC) order by id DESC) otppms_smsinfo where 1=1
order by id DESC
